room_title: Escape room "The Twilight Zone" by Xscapes in Binghamton
room_description: Your group of Twilight Zone superfans has been given exclusive access to the writer’s cottage of Rod Serling, creator of The Twilight Zone. It is here that you will learn more about the man behind this amazing show and all the other impressive accomplishments achieved by Serling. But beware, your quest for knowledge could land you inside Rod’s head.
